metadata.title: CVE-2024-1347 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions before16.9.6, all versions starting from 16.10 before 16.10.4, all versionsstarting from 16.11 before 16.11.1. Under certain conditions, an attackerthrough a crafted email address may be able to bypass domain basedrestrictions on an instance or a group.

criterions.comment: gitlab-agent package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
